name: Memento Mori (itch) (Erik Dewhurst, Kylie Briggs)
description:
The ghost of a young woman asks you to help her find her long-lost things so she can find peace. Dive into an ocean that swallowed a long-forgotten place.

This game was created for the 2021 PIGSquad Summer Slow Jam (https://itch.io/jam/ssjexploration). The theme of the Jam was "Exploration" with the creative theme of "Forgotten Places"

Playtime: ~15  minutes

Written by: Lynne Dewhurst & Erik Dewhurst
Music & SFX: Kylie Briggs (https://kyliebriggsmusic.com/)
Title Image: Kylie Briggs
Design/Development: Erik Dewhurst
Fish AI by: Kris Schultz (https://github.com/Krxtopher)
